```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tigris)
library(tidycensus)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
texas.counties <- counties(48) %>%
  st_as_sf() %>%
  st_transform(crs = 3083)
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = st_simplify(texas.counties, TRUE, 1e3))
```
